---

# Manifest (Data Source)

Read an existing Kubernetes resource and expose its attributes. This data source retrieves the full object from the API server, including server-populated fields.

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `api_version` (String) The resource apiVersion (e.g., `v1`, `apps/v1`).
- `kind` (String) The resource kind (e.g., `ConfigMap`, `Deployment`).
- `name` (String) The resource name.

### Optional

- `namespace` (String) The resource namespace. Defaults to `default` for namespaced resources.

### Read-Only

- `object` (Dynamic) The full resource object as returned by the API server.
